review: Very nice  doctor. The doctor was very friendly and caring nature. She had provided very useful suggestions and valuable information.

There are some people in the world whose assurance and explanation will give you a lot of confidence and your half treatment is done. Madam is one of them. She is extremely helpful and caring. Visited for my wife for poly cystic ovarian syndrome . She explained clearly about what has to be done. Thanks ma'am and God bless you

****** ****** **** ********* ***** ********* ** **** ******* . She was in a hurry to finish the call and leave. I had scheduled a video consult , but even without asking me she changed it to in Clinic visit. A discussion would have helped
